attributes.additional_details:
So businesses don't go bust.
So people keep their jobs.
So people still receive their pensions. 
To stop a recession.
attributes.background: To get government and other countries to sign up to a WPER, where countries agree on a date before the pandemic, and reset the economy to that date. E.g. January 1st 2020

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular we are not sure what you mean by 'reset the economy'.
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
